about_the_game:
Grab some friends or risk it alone to fend off a horde of brain eating zombies by answering 1000’s of trivia questions! Earn killstreaks to help battle against the undead by answering multiple questions in a row. Choose your difficulty and how many waves you can survive against, or even try our survival Endless mode.

Test your trivia skills with multiple categories. There are 1000’s of brain-teasing, multiple choice questions in Sport, Entertainment, History, Science & Nature, Geography, Art & Leisure and People!



KILLSTREAKS

Earn critical killstreaks by answering multiple questions in a row. Whether it's unlocking Cheats, Extra Time, throwing a high-explosive grenade or one of the other killstreaks available, you’d be wise to aim for collecting up as many of these as you can before the zombies reach you!

MULTIPLE WAVES & ENDLESS MODE

Choose many waves you will face off against with different difficulty settings. Do you want a quick and easy round on Easy Mode and one wave to brush up on your trivia? Or face the ultimate trivia challenge by facing an endless barrage of undead with our Endless mode? The choice is yours!



LAST CHANCE

If the brain-thirsty zombies get to you, you will have the chance to fight them off one-by-one in a sudden death mode in hand-to-hand combat - trivia style!




Please note: All trivia questions are in English only

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of shooting zombies and being attacked by zombies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 470 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
